intros p q.
assert (eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec ltM ltM_dec p q) (pluspf A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec ltM ltM_dec q p)).
apply pluspf_com; assumption.
assert (eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec ltM ltM_dec q p) (minuspf p (mults multA n (invTerm invA n (T1 A1 n)) q))).
apply eqp_pluspf_com; assumption.
assert (eqP A eqA n (minuspf p (mults multA n (invTerm invA n (T1 A1 n)) q)) (minuspf p q)).
apply mults_invTerm; assumption.
assert (eqP A eqA n (minuspf p q) (minuspf q p)).
apply eqp_sym; assumption.
assert (eqP A eqA n (minuspf q p) (minuspf p (mults multA n (invTerm invA n (T1 A1 n)) q))).
apply eqp_sym; assumption.
transitivity (minuspf p (mults multA n (invTerm invA n (T1 A1 n)) q)); assumption.
Qed.
